title: Elfineness
description: Silver Award in the 2015 Feathered Quill Book Awards Program for the Science Fiction/Fantasy.Back to her own self and kingdom, Luella's winning back her name Securing her reign and freedom With Derek, her re-found flame. When things are looking up like never And happiness is at her door, The Elders want her, however, Engaged in the impending war. Can she refuse without facing The consequences it may bring? Will she be capable of tracing The missing links she needs to win? And this is all on the background Of nanobots beyond control Destroying down to the ground The human race condemned to fall.
author: Tatyana K. Varenko
